name: ArduinoCodeMaster
0:
”Alexa, open arduino code master”
”Alexa, tell arduino code master give me the code for ultrasonic sensor”
”Alexa, tell arduino code master give me the wiring for infrared obstacle sensor”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: arduino code master
des:
This skill helps DIY enthusiasts to look up codes and wiring diagrams for Arduino components simply by asking Alexa. With this tool, starting a DIY project has never been easier. Makers no longer have to waste time searching for information on the web on how components can be used. 
This skill is optimized for the Echo Show or any other devices with a rectangular screen (Fire TV). It is not optimized for the round screen of the Echo Spot as code display tends to appear unorganized. This skill cannot be used with Echo devices that does not have a screen.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
